de.mrapp.android.preference.util

Class BitmapUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.preference.util.BitmapUtil

  • public final class BitmapUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which provides various methods for editing bitmaps.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static android.graphics.Bitmap clipCircle(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, int size, int borderWidth, int borderColor)
      Clips the corners of a bitmap in order to transform it into a round shape and resizes it to a specific size.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap clipSquare(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, int size, int borderWidth, int borderColor)
      Clips the long edge of a bitmap, if its width and height are not equal, in order to transform it into a square and resizes it to a specific size.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap convertDrawableToBitmap(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
      Converts a specific drawable into a bitmap.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap createTiledBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, int width, int height)
      Creates a new bitmap with a specific width and height by tiling another bitmap.
      static android.graphics.Bitmap tint(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap, int color)
      Tints a bitmap by using a specific color.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • convertDrawableToBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap convertDrawableToBitmap(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Converts a specific drawable into a bitmap.
        Parameters:
        drawable - The drawable, which should be converted, as an instance of the class Drawable. The drawable may not be null
        Returns:
        The bitmap, which has been created, as an instance of the class Bitmap

      • createTiledBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap createTiledBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                        int width,
                                                        int height)
        Creates a new bitmap with a specific width and height by tiling another bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap, which should be tiled, as an instance of the class Bitmap. The bitmap may not be null
        width - The width of the bitmap as an Integer value in pixels. The width must be at least 1
        height - The height of the bitmap as an Integer value in pixels. The height must be at least 1
        Returns:
        The bitmap, which has been created as an instance of the class Bitmap

      • clipSquare

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap clipSquare(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                 int size,
                                                 int borderWidth,
                                                 int borderColor)
        Clips the long edge of a bitmap, if its width and height are not equal, in order to transform it into a square and resizes it to a specific size. Additionally, a border will be added.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap, which should be clipped, as an instance of the class Bitmap. The bitmap may not be null
        size - The size, the bitmap should be resized to, as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1
        borderWidth - The width of the border as an Integer value in pixels. The width must be at least 0
        borderColor - The color of the border as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The clipped bitmap as an instance of the class Bitmap

      • clipCircle

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap clipCircle(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                 int size,
                                                 int borderWidth,
                                                 int borderColor)
        Clips the corners of a bitmap in order to transform it into a round shape and resizes it to a specific size. Additionally, a border will be added. Bitmaps, whose width and height are not equal, will be clipped to a square beforehand.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap, which should be clipped, as an instance of the class Bitmap. The bitmap may not be null
        size - The size, the bitmap should be resized to, as an Integer value in pixels. The size must be at least 1
        borderWidth - The width of the border as an Integer value in pixels. The width must be at least 0
        borderColor - The color of the border as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The clipped bitmap as an instance of the class Bitmap

      • tint

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap tint(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                           int color)
        Tints a bitmap by using a specific color.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - The bitmap, which should be tinted, as an instance of the class Bitmap. The bitmap may not be null
        color - The color, which should be used for tinting, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The tinted bitmap as an instance of the class Bitmap
